comment: Dr. Kim wants to be a good professor but just isn't. The course does not prepare you for the final paper. I submitted a complete rough draft and only received generic feedback. Then, she graded the final draft incredibly harshly and took off credit for things that where not even commented on in my rough draft. Do not take her class.

Dr. Kim is impossibly difficult. It is like she is teaching a different course than what is described. She is a tough grader, and her feedback is unhelpful. I was left more confused by her feedback than helped. Her virtual course is full of dead links and numbers do not match required textbook. I would avoid her class at all costs.

Dr. Kim is very friendly & answers queries quickly. However, her feedback was inconsistent. I turned in a nearly complete "rough" draft and got only positive feedback. However, she took points off the final draft for things she had said were "great" on the rough draft. She was looking for points to take off where she'd given full credit before!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Kim WANTS to be a good professor. However, the class felt disorganized and confusing quite often. The class focuses on creating a proposal, and that's fine, but we got very little direction in how to actually do that. I was extraordinarily stressed at the end of the semester because of this class.
